sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect } from "react"; const Weathercard = ({country,temp,pressure,humidity,weathermood,name,speed,sunset}) => { const [weatherIcon,setweatherIcon] = useState(""); // converting the seconds into time let sec = sunset; let date = new Date(sec * 1000); let timeStr = `${date.getHours()}:${date.getMinutes()}`; return ( <>
{temp}°
{weathermood}
{name}, {country}
{new Date().toLocaleString()}
{/* our 4column section */}

{timeStr} PM
Sunset

{humidity}
Humidity

{pressure}
Pressure

{speed}
Speed

); }; export default Weathercard;
